results.title: A Mission from Dog
results.creator_credit: Shirlee McPherson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Like Shirlee McPherson, her partner Dennis has always loved dogs, which led them to rescuing a neglected border collie and her litter of pups.

results.title: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ifran Hassan recalls leaving his homeland of Cyprus in 1970 to escape the troubled political climate, his destination, Melbourne where he set out to make a new life for himself and to help improve the lives of others.
results.title_for_label: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk

results.title: Yellow gloves
results.creator_credit: Lyn Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Originally a city girl, Lyn Johnson wondered if she was cut out to be a farmers wife but a pair of yellow gloves changed everything. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: Rowing on the Yarra
results.brief_description: A beautifully photographed portrait of Melbourne’s busy Yarra River during the rowing season with the Hoddle Bridge and passing automobile traffic framing the background using timelapse cinematography. A nostalgic feel to the film is conveyed through the use of tinted monochrome colouring and a music soundtrack.
results.description: A beautifully photographed portrait of Melbourne’s busy Yarra River during the rowing season with the Hoddle Bridge and passing automobile traffic framing the background using timelapse cinematography. A nostalgic feel to the film is conveyed through the use of tinted monochrome colouring and a music soundtrack.
description_for_label: A beautifully photographed portrait of Melbourne’s busy Yarra River during the rowing season with the Hoddle Bridge and passing automobile traffic framing the background using timelapse cinematography. A nostalgic feel to the film is conveyed through the use of tinted monochrome colouring and a music soundtrack.

results.title: Hope
results.creator_credit: Rowena Ashley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Whether in the city or a small town, Rowena Ashley’s son Michael has had to endure racism from a young age. This is a story about achieving against the odds. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rowena Ashley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Avustralyadan bir enstantane...
results.creator_credit: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.
